quoteText: You agree that if Cocoon does not exercise or enforce any legal right or remedy which is contained in the Terms (or which Cocoon has the benefit of under any applicable law), this will not be taken to be a formal waiver of Cocoonâ€™s rights and that those rights or remedies will still be available to Cocoon.
title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
